posts.post_content: All sorts of fun things you can do with this. [Dryad Arbor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dryad Arbor), [Terramorphic Expanse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terramorphic Expanse), etc. It'd be so easy to make this card huge, and as an added benefit it'll strip some of those extra lands out of your deck and accelerate your mana base. Not bad at all.

posts.post_content:
Yes it gets bigger even if it's not the reason lands are in your GY. All lands in your GY give +1/+1  
  
You cannot activate creature abilities that tap if the creature has come under your control since your last upkeep. So once she's down, you gotta wait till your next upkeep to use the ability.  
  
Also, she's amazing. My UWG landfall loves her. Emeria angel and ramp baloths best friend.
posts.html:
